## Fundamental Analysis 

### Source 
All materials regarding fundamental analysis will be scraped from MarketWatch 
<https://www.marketwatch.com/>

#### Income Statements 
https://www.marketwatch.com/investing/stock/<stockSymboLowercase>/financials
#### Balance Sheets 
https://www.marketwatch.com/investing/stock/<stockSymboLowercase>/financials/balance-sheet
#### Cash Flow Statements 
https://www.marketwatch.com/investing/stock/<stockSymbolLowercase>/financials/cash-flow

##### Remove Row by Row 
lapply( DataFrame, function(x) operation(x) ) => x will be each individual columns of one row 
lapply( revenueTable, function(x) gsub("\\r\\s+ ", "", x) )
